      public static void updateAppointment(int appointmentID, String title, String description, String location, String type, ZonedDateTime start, ZonedDateTime end, int customerID, int userID, int contactID)
      Parameters:
      appointmentID - the appointment ID to update
      title - the title to update
      description - the description to update
      location - the location to update
      type - the appointment type to update
      start - the start time to update
      end - the end time to update
      customerID - the customer id to update
      userID - the user id to update
      contactID - the contact id to update to update an appointment based on matching appointment ID

    • validateWithinBusinessHours

      public static Boolean validateWithinBusinessHours(LocalDateTime start, LocalDateTime end, LocalDate appointmentDate)
      Business hours are 8AM to 10PM EST, including weekends
      Parameters:
      start - user inputted start time
      end - user inputted end time
      appointmentDate - current date we are checking
      Returns:
      true or false depending on if appointment is within business hours

    • getFilteredCustomerAppointments

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Appointments> getFilteredCustomerAppointments(LocalDate appointmentDate, Integer inputCustomerID, LocalDateTime startDateTime, LocalDateTime endDateTime) throws SQLException
      Retrieves all appointments for a given customer using customer ID
      Parameters:
      appointmentDate - the date we are checking
      inputCustomerID - customer ID we are using to retrieve appointments
      Returns:
      List of appointments for the customer
      Throws:
      SQLException - if unable to access DB
